attributes.review: I downloaded the app to learn more about pet oranges after it loaded it took me to a page that told me to put my phone number I had no problem with that but the background photo was traumatizing I will be having nightmares for a while and I think I need to see a therapist after seeing that it seemed like an orange with extra neck skin and a face I did not enjoy the experience with this app I’d rather learn about oranges on google -10000/10 I don’t recommend I also found out that this app is connected to the 0rang3s corporate and I do not approve of it because it abuses other fruits that aren’t oranges and I think that is very rude and that we shouldn’t judge fruits for how they look or taste they are all unique and good in their own way except for oranges 🤢 I was also promised some 18+ content but did not see any so I am disappointed and unsatisfied with this app they didn’t even have Boku no pico which I thought was a classic but over all this app is trash though I guess this app would probably have more illegal things since the orange in the first picture is a child molester and rapist .. anyways I also saw some pictures of this orange before and I want to know why he feels the need to keep a mini hotdog between his legs is it for when he gets hungry? And why does it look rotten 🤢 I feel bad for his son who has to deal with this foolishness I will never download an app like this ever again😡

attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app all I wanted was to get updates and see where our president would be for rallies. And everything was going amazing until approximately two fortnights prior to me writing this review. I was using the app just minding my own business when I heard an incessant scratching sound coming from underneath my bed. I was home alone at the time and opted to stay inside to avoid the riots led by angry people in my home city of Minneapolis. Like why do people think it’s okay to burn down the entire city. All the police officer did was suffocate a man for almost 9 minutes. He was black so it didn’t really count. Honestly this would be a bigger problem if the it was a full human, it was only 3/5 of one so it clearly doesn’t warrant the reaction it has received. But back to what I was saying, there was an incessant scratching noise on the underside of my bed. So I sat up and closed the app and turned on my flashlight. I used it to shine light under my bed and peaked under. You wouldn’t believe what I saw. A CREATURE. It was hunched and covered in blubber. I was a freakish orange tint and gave off a pungent stench that seeped into my nostrils and assaulted my very being. As you have probably guessed by now it was the very same man who was my president. I was absolutely delighted he paid a visit to my humble abode. And when I offered him food and a comfortable bed he refused and said he would rather stay under my bed than face the angry mobs of people outside my home. Which is understandable. Why should the leader of our country be held accountable for his mistakes, that clearly unacceptable. To summarize everything, the reason I gave this app a one star rating was because of the terrible stench of injustice, misogyny, pedophilia, racism, homophobia and disease it left under my bed.
attributes.title: Embarrassed

attributes.review: I got the app in hopes of getting relevant news about 🇺🇸✨America✨🇺🇸 but after literal HOURS of downloading, I was instead greeted by pages of misinformation and heavily-biased media, organized and adopted by a gross orange🤢. Additionally, rather than just keeping his biased booty inside his own little app, he’s attempting to take down other important sources of news media like Tik Tok that disagree with his ugly beliefs😡 Gen Z will not tolerate this. Worst app I’ve ever had, -999999/10 💅
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever had🤢👎😡

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because of my wonderful, racist president, Donald Duck. At first I thought it was the best app ever but till this day I regret ever coming across this app. It was a Sunday afternoon when I decided to download it. My grandma and my dog, Barron, were right beside me when suddenly I felt an electric shock through my body. Turns out I died along with Barron and my grandma. I’m currently writing this from hell and I hope to see Donald Duck here soon so I can beat his nonexistent ass✨😌. RIP grandma. RIP barron. RIP me😗 
‼️Avoid downloading this app unless you want to DIE‼️
attributes.title: Do not recommend🧚‍♀️⚰️🙈🤢
